channel.title: CVE Feed for Pierre Lebedel -- Kodex Posts likes

item.title: CVE-2024-44036|2024-10-07T12:28:10.471Z -- pierre%20lebedel -- kodex%20posts%20likes
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Pierre Lebedel Kodex Posts likes allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Kodex Posts likes: from n/a through 2.5.0.
